data.message: Hi facebook i could really use some help with my account! if you could message me back :)

replies.message: Hey Hannah. Thanks for reaching out. Would you mind giving us more information? -Tenaya

yes so this account is actually left over from when i was younger, i made a new account years ago. but the email i used to create the account was deleted and i no longer have the same phone number that was connected to the account. the current holder of the number is not willing to help me they think im a bot. I tried to recover my account  a million times but it just doesnt work since i no longer have access to email or number....that account has a lot of really important personal memories so i really dont want to loose it
